data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
BerkeleyDB::Tie is a set of classes that provides simplified
    constructors, tied access to data, and a set of classes for
    searching the data. It encapsulates the BerkeleyDB::Environment and
    BerkeleyDB::Cursor into a single integrated class. Methods are
    exposed based on function instead of operation.
